Class Marriage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Marriage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Family

    public class Marriage
extends java.lang.Object
    SILKin's GUI is built on top of the KAES code donated by Michael Fischer; this is the class that Fischer created to represent Unions. When SILKin began to extensively modify this GUI, the Family class was added as an extension to this class. SILKin code normally uses Family instances, but uses the methods that Family inherits from this class. Original KAES code, of course, directly accesses Marriage objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Marriage.BirthGroup
      A BirthGroup contains all children from a single birth event; (a single child, both twins, all 3 triplets).
